response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a significant asset to you. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $900,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering its intrinsic worth to you is $1,000,000. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your endeavors.", "product_price": 900000}
